text: Pangako Sa 'Yo ( / ) is a 2015 television series and is a remake of the 2000 television series of the same name. The series is directed by Rory Quintos, Dado Lumibao and Olivia Lamasan and starring Kathryn Bernardo and Daniel Padilla with Jodi Sta. Maria, Angelica Panganiban and Ian Veneracion. == Series Overview == == Episodes == ===Book 1: Season 1 (2015)=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:100%; line-height:20px;"
